required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nomogram Control of Predictive Factors of Early Withdrawal After Gynecologic Oncology Surgery in the Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) Protocol and Assessment of Practices
clinical_study.official_title: Nomogram Control of Predictive Factors of Early Withdrawal After Gynecologic Oncology Surgery in the Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) Protocol and Assessment of Practices

brief_summary.textblock: Validation of a predictive nomogram of a short hospital stay (less than two days after surgery) on a prospective cohort of patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
- Validation of a predictive nomogram of short-term hospitalization (less than two days after surgery)
- Analysis of the factors influencing the variations of average length of stay
- Morbidity analysis of the ERAS program

primary_outcome.measure: Validation of a predictive nomogram of a short hospital stay (less than two days after surgery) on a prospective cohort of patients.
primary_outcome.description: Validation of a predictive nomogram of short-term hospitalization (less than two days after surgery)

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the factors influencing the variations of average length of stay.
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of the factors influencing the variations of the average duration of stay in time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the variation of the average duration of stay in time.
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of the variation of the average duration of stay in time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Morbidity analysis of the ERAS program.
secondary_outcome.description: Morbidity analysis of the ERAS program

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of the implementation of the ERAS program on the entire cohort.
secondary_outcome.description: Description of the implementation of the ERAS program on the entire cohort.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients discharged before 2 days after surgery
arm_group.description: patients discharged before 2 days of hospitalization following surgery

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients discharged after 2 days after surgery
arm_group.description: patients discharging after 2 days of hospitalization following surgery

intervention.description: Predictive nomogram of short-term hospitalization (less than two days after surgery) Factors influencing the variations of average stay lenght Morbidity of the ERAS program
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients discharged before 2 days after surgery
Patients discharged after 2 days after surgery

study_pop.textblock: All patients who had surgery for gynecological cancer under the RAAC program.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients who had surgery for gynecological cancer under the ERAS program.
Exclusion Criteria:
